Building Communities provides particular support to BAME and marginalised women, 50yr+, lone parents, vulnerable, asylum seekers, refugees and NEETS who have no skills, no confidence, residential status issues and thus do not meet eligibility criteria to enrol onto government funded programmes, due to these reasons and barriers. Through unaccredited programmes, we provide essential key basic skills to engage them into society and pave pathways for continued learning and workshops to gain life skills.
